Za Slovenca rekel, da ni normalen, in takoj fasal disciplinski postopek
Legendarnega Pešića čaka verjetno tudi denarna kazen.
03 Nov 2019, 10:04 by A. L.
BEOGRAD – Po spopadu med Zvezdo in Barcelono je na novinarski konferenci spregovoril legendarni srbski trener Svetislav Pešić in med drugim za predsednika Združenja igralcev evrolige (lahko bi tudi rekli sindikata), Slovenca Boštjana Nachbarja, izjavil, da ni normalen. Zaradi tega je proti njemu stekel disciplinski postopek, poroča portal Espreso.rs.»Še tega nam je treba, da Nachbar vpeljuje nova pravila, da bi 24. avgusta morali začeti priprave za prihodnjo sezono. On ni normalen fant, on ne ve, da smo v Evropi in ne v NBA. Po navadi od NBA poberemo prav tisto, kar ni v redu,« je prepričan Pešić. Dodal je še: »Predstavljajte si, da zahteva, da se začne trenirati 24. avgusta, medtem ko imamo superpokal Španije 21. septembra. Sezona se začne v zadnjem tednu septembra. Torej imamo štiri tedne za pripravo na sezono, ki traja deset mesecev. Človek ni normalen,« je bil jasen Pešić.Prav ta izjava je sprožila val kritik in zaradi katere je stekel disciplinski postopek, čaka pa ga verjetno tudi denarna kazen.

He told the Slovenian that he was not normal and immediately disciplined the disciplinary procedure
The legendary Pesic is also likely to be fined.
03 Nov 2019, 10:04 by A.L.
BELGRADE - After the clash between Zvezda and Barcelona, legendary Serbian coach Svetislav Pesic spoke at a press conference, stating that he is not normal, the president of the Euroleague Players' Association (we might also call the union), Slovenian Bostjan Nachbar. As a result, he has been subject to disciplinary action, Espreso.rs reports. He's not a normal guy, he doesn't know we're in Europe and not the NBA. Usually, we pick up from the NBA exactly what's wrong, "Pešić believes. He added: “Imagine requiring him to start training on August 24, while we have the Spanish Super Cup on September 21. The season begins in the last week of September. So we have four weeks to prepare for the ten-month season. The man is not normal, "Pesic was clear. It was this statement that triggered a wave of criticism that prompted him to initiate disciplinary proceedings, and is likely to be fined.
